title: Where did my gem stones go
body: Hi, I have my account in OCE named Victrius, I had 4 gem stones from hex-tech crafting boxes before but it disappeared for some reason, can you please check for me what happened.

replies.body:
If you [open a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) they can figure out what happened to them. The queue is pretty short right now so they should get back to you quickly.

I'd also make sure you're logging in to the right account. Often times I've seen someone confuse their main account or summoner name with that of a smurf if they haven't logged in in a while.
I would say that Victrius is their main account, because not many people would use $30 for the 1 skin on their smurf account, it would be more likely they got elementalist lux for their main account.
